weekly_top_story.headline: US Government Shutdown Affects Indian Professionals
weekly_top_story.summary: The US government shutdown significantly impacts Indian professionals, particularly those on H-1B visas or in the green card pipeline, due to suspended Department of Labor operations.

stories.headline: Flotilla defies Italy, nears Gaza maritime blockade as Israel prepares interception operation during Yom Kippur
stories.summary: A flotilla of vessels carrying activists is approaching Gaza despite warnings, prompting Israel to prepare for interception operations.

stories.headline: Elon Musk announces Grokipedia, a Wikipedia competitor powered by Grok AI
stories.summary: Elon Musk revealed plans for Grokipedia, a Wikipedia competitor using Grok AI, aiming to address bias and funding issues.

stories.headline: Philippines responds to 6.9 magnitude Cebu earthquake with swift rescue operations and community support initiatives
stories.summary: Authorities and communities in Cebu are actively engaged in search, rescue, and relief efforts following a 6.9 magnitude earthquake.
